title: Why Teens Crave Independence
description: A micro-lesson that makes Why Teens Crave Independence usable.

hook.text: A fifteen-year-old demands more freedom. Her parents see defiance. Biology sees preparation.

discovery.text: Decreasing oxytocin sensitivity to parents and increasing dopamine from new experiences drive the shift.

twist.text: The teens who push hardest for independence often form the healthiest adult relationships later.
